name: Rotator (itch) (Aalto University - Game Design)
description:
ROTATOR is an inky black adventure game where you use magic staff to generate gorgeous magical bullets to attack bizarre and evil creatures. View rotation ability helps you survive from bullet hell, critically attack an enemy and solve puzzles.

Credits:

Producer: Ken Oshiro
Artist: Yuxuan Liu
Game Designer, Programmer: Jinda Li
Level Designer, Programmer: Peiyu Ling
Combat Designer, Programmer: Wesley Wang
Sound Designer: Marija Šumarac
